snippet: The Education Department said Friday that roughly 300 additional students had been wrongly excluded from eligibility in public school gifted programs because of another mistake by the testing company.
abstract: New York City's Education Department says roughly 300 additional students were wrongly excluded from eligibility in public school gifted programs because of mistake by testing company Pearson; statement comes three weeks after thousands of students were excluded from programs due to company's mistakes.
lead_paragraph: The Education Department said Friday that roughly 300 additional students had been wrongly excluded from eligibility in public school gifted programs because of another mistake by the testing company.

headline.seo: New Error Found in Test Scoring for Gifted Programs
headline.main: New Error Found in Scoring of Test for Gifted Programs
headline.print_headline: New Error Found in Scoring of Test for Gifted Programs
